plot outline: Set during demonetization, two gangs meet in the interior of the Western Ghats for a fun-filled night of partying. They wake up to a surprise when they discover that some of their friends have gone missing. Joined by a third gang, they form a search party and start a hilarious journey.
title: Mataash
plot: The announcement of demonetization has India in a frenzy. And in Karnataka, there are three gangs of people whose life gets interlinked with new currency being on the loose.

Set during demonetization, two gangs meet in the interior of the Western Ghats for a fun-filled night of partying. They wake up to a surprise when they discover that some of their friends have gone missing. Joined by a third gang, they form a search party and start a hilarious journey.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
